vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Est.9.8;
son of: Haman (H2001);
brother of: Parshandatha (H6577), Dalphon (H1813), Aspatha (H0630), Poratha (H6334), Adalia (H0118), Parmashta (H6534), Arisai (H0747), Aridai (H0742) and Vaizatha (H2055)
§ Aridatha = "the lion of the decree"
a son of Haman
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞利大他 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "法令之獅" 或"亞利所賜的"
哈曼的兒子 {#斯 9:8}}
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚利大他 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "法令之狮" 或"亚利所赐的"
哈曼的儿子 {#斯 9:8}}
